PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06372021-06-24LAB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPay Equity Act
SubjectPay Equity Regulations
PrecisPAY EQUITY REGULATIONS in order to (1) bring forward a proactive pay equity regime that will apply to the federally-regulated public and private sectors; and (2) ensure pay equity is achieved and maintained, to help address systemic gender discrimination in compensation practices and pay systems, and to contribute to reducing the gender wage gap by addressing the portion of the gap due to the undervaluation of work done by women.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0161 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
